post:
If you’ve been searching for high-quality affordable VPS (virtual private servers), you have found a perfect option. Welcome to INXY marketplace!

We offer a wide range of hosting solutions from the leading providers.
INXY marketplace offers 75+ VPS solutions from Hostry, Advanced Hosters, and Fozzy. The price of VPS starts from as low as $5/month! You are free to choose configuration and datacenter locations (Netherlands, Czech Republic, Ukraine, Bulgaria, Latvia, Poland, Russia, Singapore, USA).

The benefits of VPS servers from INXY marketplace include:
  • 99% uptime or money-back guarantee;
  • Easy customization of configuration;
  • Fast set-up;
  • Excellent speed and reliability;
  • Wide coverage;
  • Well-established providers.

Why order a VPS on INXY?

  • A large catalog of various VPS servers with convenient search. All providers in one place: sort out and compare prices and configurations;
  • Affordable price: you can buy a VPS for the cost of shared hosting;
  • All providers are tested and proved to be the best on hosting market;
  • Enjoy double customer support – from us and VPS provider.

Besides, INXY supports various payment methods and provides free consultations for choosing hosting services and maintaining them.

Check our catalog of affordable VPS solutions here.
